Man on Wire is a captivating documentary about a daring tightrope walker who performs a high-wire routine between the World Trade Center towers. The film highlights the risks and artistry involved in this dangerous profession.

Dear John is a suspenseful psychological thriller about a girl who hides out with transvestites and faces various challenges due to the prejudice and discrimination she encounters.
